meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vapid.
meanings.sent1: Her speech was filled with vapidities, lacking any depth or meaning.
meanings.sent2: The vapidities of the conversation made it hard to stay interested.
meanings.sent3: The vapidities of the movie script were so exaggerated that they became comical.
meanings.sent4: The vapidities of small talk felt like empty bubbles floating in the air.
meanings.sent5: The vapidities of his excuses were transparent and unconvincing.
